sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnserverresrceloginfo ( server_eqpmn_id , cpu_use_rt , mory_use_rt , svc_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , server_id , log_id ) VALUES ( #serverEqpmnId# , #cpuUseRt# , #moryUseRt# , #svcSttus# , #logInfo# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #serverId# , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnserverresrceloginfo SET server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId# , cpu_use_rt = #cpuUseRt# , mory_use_rt = #moryUseRt# , svc_sttus = #svcSttus# , log_info = #logInfo# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , server_id = #serverId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId# AND server_id = #serverId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnserverresrceloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId# AND server_id = #serverId# AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT server_eqpmn_id , cpu_use_rt , mory_use_rt , svc_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , server_id , last_updt_pnttm , log_id FROM COMTNSERVERRESRCELOGINFO WHERE server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId# AND server_id = #serverId# AND log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID , A.CPU_USE_RT , A.MORY_USE_RT , A.SVC_STTUS , A.LOG_INFO , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.SERVER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID , CPU_USE_RT , MORY_USE_RT , SVC_STTUS , LOG_INFO , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , SERVER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LOG_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNSERVERRESRCELOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword#
CPU_USE_RT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SERVER_EQPMN_ID DESC , SERVER_ID DESC , LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSERVERRESRCELOGINFO WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword#
CPU_USE_RT LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
